title: HSBC France management denies plan to sell retail business, says union
text:
People pass by an HSBC branch bank in the financial district in New York, U.S., August 7, 2019. REUTERS/Brendan McDermid

PARIS (Reuters) - Management of HSBC (HSBA.L) in France on Thursday denied rumours about the bank’s exit from retail banking in the country in a message to staff, a union source said.

“We have just received a denial of the rumours by the general management,” the union source told Reuters.

The Wall Street Journal reported the plan on Wednesday.

HSBC was not immediately available for a comment.
